name: L0ve at First Sight
description:
Get the 2 dots together without them losing sight of each other!

In this short-but-sweet puzzle game, you must navigate around levels to eventually get the 2 dots to Join Together (hence the theme of the 2021 GMTK Game Jam). The catch? You cannot let the dots lose sight of each other, or you will fail the level and must restart. Can you beat all 7 levels?

All credits are in the game.
